name: Equitania
categories: Single-player;Full controller support;Custom Volume Controls;Adjustable Difficulty;Playable without Timed Input;Stereo Sound;Family Sharing
description: Equitania is an open-world horse racing game focused on archery. Jump over obstacles and slow down time to land perfect midair trickshots with ease. Chain them into impressive combos to complete challenges. Bond with your horse, level up, and explore a world full of dark secrets and plot twists.

name: 缘之绳
categories: Single-player;Adjustable Text Size;Custom Volume Controls;Adjustable Difficulty;Keyboard Only Option;Mouse Only Option;Save Anytime;Stereo Sound;Subtitle Options;Surround Sound;Touch Only Option;Family Sharing
description: 《缘之绳》是一款角色扮演多结局养成游戏。你自灵木中复苏，被师父带回门派，成为了她唯一的弟子。在这未来的日子里，选择自己的道路，无论是刀枪剑戟、琴棋书画；还是采药掘矿、狩猎捕鱼，又或是锻打缝纫、制丹谱曲，相信你都能成就一番不俗的伟业。因缘际会之下，这段找寻身世的成长之旅，会邂逅怎样的故事，最终又会走向何方？

name: Lilialette's Hustle: Getting My Hands Dirty to Save My Guild
description: Lilialette loves life as a guild receptionist, but between the upcoming guild merger and budget cuts, she might be getting fired soon! Help Lilialette get into gear and take on quests to turn her F-Rank guild into a bustling hub for adventurers... and save her dream job, of course!

name: Sexchmia
description: Step into the role of Lapis Fellucia, an ambitious and beautiful alchemist with big dreams. Explore the world, complete quests, battle monsters, and gather materials to create the rarest items. Help Lapis achieve her goal of becoming a top-tier alchemist, no matter what it takes!

name: The Last Ninja Collection + Bonus Games
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;PvP;Shared/Split Screen PvP;Shared/Split Screen;Full controller support;Keyboard Only Option;Family Sharing
description: A tribute to the golden era of Retro gaming that brings together 7 iconic titles for the first time. This is more than a collection; it's a celebration of gaming history and the preservation of pioneering games from the '80's & '90's allowing you to relive the C64, Amiga and Spectrum versions.

name: Whispers Among the Poppies
description: Hand-drawn narrative journey seen through the eyes of a child who lives through war and carries a mysterious gift — the ability to speak to the souls of the dead.

name: Spine Lasher - Demo
categories: Single-player;Game demo;Custom Volume Controls;Keyboard Only Option;Partial Controller Support
description: With a whip made of human spines, you face the nightmarish creatures of humankind. Lash your enemies with your whip, stab them with your knives, crush them under chandeliers, and deflect weapons back at them—do whatever it takes to cleanse this world of darkness!

name: Bher
description: Delve dungeons, craft items and build relationships as you work to recover your memory. Bher is a town under siege, and you are an amnesiac with nothing to your name. Search dark woods and caves for resources and craft powerful weapons to delve into infested mines, forgotten swamps, and worse.

name: Adeline's story
description: «Adeline’s Story» — a psychological-horror visual novel about a girl who moves from a bustling city to a godforsaken village, where the nighttime silence is ripped apart by inhuman screams and people vanish one by one.

name: Colloblast: Kingdoms of Cosmos
description: A sci-fi RTS game with base building and resource gathering.

name: Jump Now
description: A simple yet challenging platformer. Jump from platform to platform, collect stars, and unlock new worlds every 15 stars. Each world brings fresh ideas, new mechanics, and tricky challenges. Precise jumps, pure platforming, no frills.

name: The Last Purge
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Camera Comfort;Color Alternatives;Custom Volume Controls;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Steam Cloud;Stats;Steam Leaderboards;Family Sharing
description: A unique indie game combining strategy card play, team building, and a distinctive take on the auto-battler genre. Easy to pick up, endlessly fun to explore, and surprisingly hard to put down.
supported_languages: English;French;German;Japanese;Portuguese - Portugal;Russian;Simplified Chinese;Spanish - Latin America;Traditional Chinese

name: Rawring Candies
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;Co-op;Online Co-op;Shared/Split Screen Co-op;Shared/Split Screen;Full controller support;Family Sharing
description: A couch co-op for players looking for confectionary chaos. “Sweet and Salty” NO! It’s all about Sweet v/s Salty here

name: Strange Pet World
description: Strange Pet World is a fantastical role-playing game where players enter a mesmerizing world filled with wondrous landscapes, including radiant golden trees, fiery red forests, and immaculate white snowfields. In this game, players nurture and evolve their pets, embarking on a unique adventure.

name: Funky Monkey: Time to Slack Off! Demo
description: Every click is a sacrifice to fate! Keep working, keep slacking off, and smash that keyboard— all for the monkey’s hats, outfits, and all kinds of wild accessories! Dress it up, keep it company, and create the coolest desktop look— everything is for the monkey!
supported_languages: English;French;German;Spanish - Spain;Russian;Turkish;Japanese;Polish;Simplified Chinese;Traditional Chinese;Portuguese - Brazil;Portuguese - Portugal;Spanish - Latin America

name: ARONDIGHT アロンダイト
description: ZANAC-like Ultra High-Speed Scrolling 2D Shooter Humanity suffered a crushing defeat in the war against the sentient AI, RA6 the Great Sovereign, losing 70% of the global population. Now, you board the anti-AI fighter MSX-3 Arondight, and launch into the final battle against the Sovereign.

name: Friendship Simulator
description: Experience old school couch split-screen gaming as if you had friends.

name: Slice Surge
description: Unleash your slicing skills in Slice Surge! Cut through dragons, fries, treasure, and more in 100+ fun and challenging levels. With colorful cartoon visuals and satisfying slice effects, this one-touch puzzle game is easy to learn but hard to master!

name: Space Cowboy Radio
categories: Single-player;Full controller support;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Stereo Sound;Family Sharing
description: An indie action-RPG where you pilot customizable ships through side-scrolling combat, level up unique characters, and dismantle a corrupt galactic regime one mission at a time.

name: Crucible Of Time
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;PvP;Online PvP;LAN PvP;Co-op;Online Co-op;LAN Co-op;Custom Volume Controls;Adjustable Difficulty;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Touch Only Option;Family Sharing
description: A retro 4X game inspired by classic versions of the genre. Lead your people from a small nomadic tribe into a globe-spanning space-fairing civilization. Can your empire survive the Crucible Of Time?

name: Baa-Baa Blitz: The Sheeps kebab Incident
description: Baa-Baa Blitz: The Sheep’s Kebab Incident is a fast-paced action platformer where momentum is everything and sheep are… highly flammable. Play as a fire-breathing dragon and race on wild courses at breakneck speed. Glide through rings, collect coins, and ram wooly bystanders who go boom!

name: RovNav
description: Program rovers with a visual Node Graph system to Navigate Complex Grids. Connect Movement, Sensor, and State Nodes to build custom logic. Use dropdowns to configure actions and wires to define flow.

name: Ingunn: A Swordmaiden Voyage
description: A First-person Action Adventure set in the frozen north with plenty of spicy scenes. Play as Ingunn, who has inherited her dead fathers burdens through a witches spell, and must now ensure the continuation of the bloodline.

name: Wolvenrise
categories: Multi-player;PvP;Online PvP;Co-op;Online Co-op;Cross-Platform Multiplayer;Steam Achievements;In-App Purchases;Custom Volume Controls;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Touch Only Option;Steam Cloud;HDR available;Family Sharing
description: The game takes place in a dark, medieval-inspired village shrouded in air of suspense and mistrust. The atmospheric setting immerses players in a high-stakes battle of survival, where every decision and accusation can mean the difference between victory and defeat.

name: this game will end in 205 clicks. the artbook
description: An artbook for this game will end in 205 clicks. Can you believe this has 25 pages?!?
supported_languages: English;French;Italian;German;Spanish - Spain;Arabic;Bulgarian;Czech;Danish;Dutch;Finnish;Greek;Hungarian;Indonesian;Japanese;Korean;Norwegian;Polish;Portuguese - Brazil;Portuguese - Portugal;Romanian;Russian;Simplified Chinese;Spanish - Latin America;Swedish;Thai;Traditional Chinese;Turkish;Ukrainian;Vietnamese;Afrikaans;Albanian;Amharic;Armenian;Assamese;Azerbaijani;Bangla;Basque;Belarusian;Bosnian;Catalan;Cherokee;Croatian;Dari;Estonian;Filipino;Galician;Georgian;Gujarati;Hausa;Hebrew;Hindi;Icelandic;Igbo;Irish;K'iche';Kannada;Kazakh;Khmer;Kinyarwanda;Konkani;Kyrgyz;Latvian;Lithuanian;Luxembourgish;Macedonian;Malay;Malayalam;Maltese;Maori;Marathi;Mongolian;Nepali;Odia;Persian;Punjabi (Gurmukhi);Punjabi (Shahmukhi);Quechua;Scots;Serbian;Sindhi;Sinhala;Slovak;Slovenian;Sorani;Sotho;Swahili;Tajik;Tamil;Tatar;Telugu;Tigrinya;Tswana;Turkmen;Urdu;Uyghur;Uzbek;Valencian;Welsh;Wolof;Xhosa;Yoruba;Zulu

name: Freedom Bomber
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Custom Volume Controls;Keyboard Only Option;Save Anytime;Stereo Sound;Partial Controller Support;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: Bomb your way to freedom! Manage your weapons and upgrade your pilot and repel the invaders of your territory in this side scrolling action game.

name: Unboxing Mr. Coo
description: Mr Coo gets into a new conundrum, this time through the not-so-simple act of opening a gift box. A puzzle and narrative game without words, where you click your way through a mesmerizing toy.

name: Maw the Moon
description: Maw the Moon is an adaptive auto‑battler where you build the strongest party mid‑battle, plan around deadly boss patterns, and watch chain reactions explode.

name: Sosnova
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Steam Leaderboards;Family Sharing
description: Explore an endless, procedurally generated world in Sosnova. Evade monsters and military forces, drive 50's-90's style cars, and gather supplies to survive. With total freedom and retro aesthetics, every adventure is unique. How far will you go to endure in this ultimate 90's inspired adventure?

name: Nations
description: Select an era, a nation and lead it to greatness or decay. Develop the economy and society, or focus on military and territorial expansion. In Nations you can rule your people for centuries – from ancient times to the modern day and beyond. You shape your state, history and map of the world.

name: KARMx
categories: Single-player;Custom Volume Controls;Adjustable Difficulty;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Stereo Sound;Steam Cloud;Includes level editor;Family Sharing
description: A lovecraftian medieval fantasy boomer shooter with a runtime level editor.

name: Jail College
description: JAIL COLLEGE is an adult visual novel that blends erotic storytelling, trivia challenges, and interactive choices. Play as a wrongly imprisoned man offered a chance at freedom through a sensual multicultural program. Pass quizzes, seduce hot woman, and get your freedom back!

name: Warrior Mage or Rogue alike
categories: Single-player;Full controller support;Custom Volume Controls;Keyboard Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Family Sharing
description: Customize your hero by choosing your base stats, class, weapon load-out, and passive skills! Your build determines how fast you run, how high you jump and of course how much damage you deal! Test your build on a monster-slaying adventure, leveling up as you go.

name: CARNEDGE
categories: Single-player;Custom Volume Controls;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Family Sharing
description: CARNEDGE is a dark fantasy RPG where you drag the Eternal Flame across a dying world. Build deadly decks, summon weird allies, and fight through twisted dungeons full of enemies that hate your guts and watch chaos unfold!

name: Epic War Collection
description: Command fantasy armies, make tactical choices, and observe epic battles unfold in this re-imagination of an old school classic!

name: A Better Tomorrow
categories: Single-player;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input
description: Rabies shatters a young cop's peaceful life. Confronted by this incurable virus, he must choose: leave the police force or hide his illness to trace his infection source. In this visual novel, witness his fate while uncovering the city's darkest secrets—past and present.

name: Echoes of Nothing
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Camera Comfort;Custom Volume Controls;Stereo Sound;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: Explore the vast ruin of a massive colony ship, find powerful weapons, ships and equipment, and decide the fate of existence itself. Dodge bullets, distract missiles and outmaneuver your enemies, then retaliate with lasers and heavy artillery.

name: Shellborne
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;Co-op;Online Co-op;Steam Achievements;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Steam Cloud;Stats
description: Shellborne is a chaotic co-op game, where you guide a giant mystical turtle, over a dangerous mountain path. Collect resources and flee from the evil fog.

name: I Wanna Play That Picture Puzzle with Numbers All Day!
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Custom Volume Controls;Adjustable Difficulty;Keyboard Only Option;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Steam Cloud
description: I want to play that puzzle—where you look at the numbers on the left and top and fill in the intersecting squares—forever! In a rainy café, you can quietly and endlessly immerse yourself in solving puzzles.

name: Neo Run
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Adjustable Text Size;Camera Comfort;Color Alternatives;Custom Volume Controls;Adjustable Difficulty;Keyboard Only Option;Mouse Only Option;Stereo Sound;Surround Sound;Steam Cloud;Stats;Steam Leaderboards;Family Sharing
description: NeoRun is a fast-paced first-person parkour game with real-time adaptive music. Run, jump, wallrun, climb, and swing without losing momentum. Powered by Steam Audio, Adaptive Pulse syncs the soundtrack to your every move for a fully immersive experience.

name: Return to Trahulara
categories: Single-player;Playable without Timed Input;Stereo Sound;Partial Controller Support;Family Sharing
description: RETURN TO TRAHULARA is a Stylized, third person sci fi shooter. Shoot and run gameplay, combined with multiple factions of NPC’s that fight each other for survival, with or without your help. Run the linear mission based storyline or use the devmod panel to create your own freeform battle scenarios.

name: Winter Witch
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Custom Volume Controls;Keyboard Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Family Sharing
description: A cozy game about a witch who lived in the woods. Explore and craft as you traverse deeper into the woods.

name: Childhood Watermelon
description: This is a casual puzzle game, where the position of each game image is random and can be repeated.At first, it may be very chaotic,Then gradually place the image in the corresponding position,The image gradually becomes complete,Come and give it a try!

name: Daisen
categories: Single-player;Full controller support;Captions available;Custom Volume Controls;Adjustable Difficulty;Stereo Sound;Subtitle Options;Steam Cloud;Steam Leaderboards;Commentary available;Family Sharing
description: Forget about ammo. Forget about reloading. Don’t let your weapon overheat. Daisen is a fast-paced shooter. Step into the role of a girl plunging into chaos to unravel the anomalous influence spreading across the land.

name: Twelve Mental Patients
description: You play as a mad doctor who finds himself in a forgotten psychiatric hospital. Your mind teeters on the edge of insanity, and the only way out is to end the suffering of patients who can no longer be saved.

name: 100 Day Term
description: A casual text game where the player, chosen as a lucky leader, heads the "Economic Efficiency Optimization Department." Under a great president, they must boost economic benefits and government efficiency within 100 days.

name: Under The Basement
description: How deep will you go to find a way out? Play if you want... survive if you can.

name: Mobsteria
description: A strategic text-based crime game where you build a criminal empire from the ground up. Execute heists, recruit associates, craft weapons, and compete against players in this deep browser-based game. Rise from street thug to crime boss through tactical decision-making and ruthless ambition.

name: Stellar Nemesis
categories: Single-player;Full controller support;Custom Volume Controls;Keyboard Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Stereo Sound;Family Sharing
description: A high-definition arcade shooter blending old-school action with modern polish. Battle across the Solar System, upgrade your weapons, and unlock tougher challenges in Nemesis Mode - all set to a hypnotic, retro-electro soundtrack.

name: みんなでPhysical TRAIN ～チャムランド国営鉄道～
description: Drive an exciting train using physics simulation and complete missions to develop Chamland!
